Login_Description1: In order to use the editing and rating capabilities of TMDB, as well as get personal recommendations you will need to login to your account. If you do not have an account, registering for an account is free and simple. Click here to get started.
Login_Description2: If you signed up but didn't get your verification email, click here to have it resent.

collection.welcome: Millions of movies, TV shows and people to discover. Explore now.

collection.join_today_desc: Get access to maintain your own custom personal lists, track what you've seen and search and filter for what to watch nextâ€”regardless if it's in theatres, on TV or available on popular streaming services like .

collection.join_log: Log the movies and TV shows you've seen Build custom lists
